Counting.english: I have one brother (masc, nom)
Counting.russian: У меня́ оди́н брат

Counting.english: I have one sister (fem, nom)
Counting.russian: У меня́ одна́ сестра́

Counting.english: She has only one lesson on Tuesday (neut, nom)
Counting.russian: У неё то́лько одно́ заня́тие по вто́рникам

Counting.english: He has one watch (pl, nom)
Counting.russian: У него́ одни́ часы́

Counting.english: They saw one film (masc, inanim acc)
Counting.russian: Они смотре́ли оди́н фильм

Counting.english: My mom read one book this week (fem, inanim acc)
Counting.russian: Моя́ ма́ма чита́ла одну́ кни́гу на э́той неде́ле

Counting.english: I witnessed one student (masc, anim acc)
Counting.russian: Я ви́дела одного́ студе́нта

Counting.english: Two female students on Saturday came to the meeting
Counting.russian: Две студентки в субботу приходили на встречу (2 nom = gen.sg ending)

Counting.english: In the room, there are two chairs
Counting.russian: В ко́мнате два сту́ла (2 nom = gen.sg ending)

Counting.english: Three tigers live in the city zoo
Counting.russian: Три ти́гра живу́т в городско́м зоопа́рке (3 nom = gen.sg ending)

Counting.english: I took two glasses and went to the hotel room
Counting.russian: Я взя́л два стака́на и вы́шел в гости́ную (2 inanim.acc = gen.sg ending)

Counting.english: Papa bought four oranges
Counting.russian: Па́па купи́л четы́ре апельси́на (4 inanim.acc = gen.sg ending)

Counting.english: Misha introduced us to two co-workers
Counting.russian: Ми́ша предста́вил нам двух сотру́дников (2 anim.acc = gen.pl endings)

Counting.english: We saw three birds in the garden
Counting.russian: Мы ви́дели трёх птиц в саду́ (3 anim.acc = gen.pl ending)

Counting.english: Nina has sold four kittens on the market
Counting.russian: Ни́на продала́ четырёх котя́т на ры́нке (4 anim.acc = gen.pl ending)

Counting.english: She has five books and six pencils
Counting.russian: У неё пять кни́г и шесть карандаше́й (5+ nom = gen.pl)

Counting.english: The company opened eight branches
Counting.russian: Фи́рма откры́ла во́семь филиа́лов (5+ acc = gen.pl)

Counting.english: We invited ten guests for dinner
Counting.russian: Мы пригласи́ли десять госте́й на обе́д (5+ anim.acc = gen.pl)

Counting.english: I have one younger brother
Counting.russian: У меня́ оди́н мла́дший брат

Counting.english: I have one older sister
Counting.russian: У меня́ одна́ ста́ршая сестра́

Counting.english: They watched one Russian film
Counting.russian: Они смотре́ли оди́н ру́сский фильм

Counting.english: My mother ready one new book this week
Counting.russian: Моя́ ма́ма чита́ла одну́ но́вую кни́гу на э́той неде́ле

Counting.english: She bought one fashionable pants
Counting.russian: Она́ купи́ла одни́ мо́дные брю́ки

Counting.english: I saw one smart student
Counting.russian: Я ви́дела одного́ у́много студе́нта

Counting.english: Two interesting female students were coming to the meeting.
Counting.russian: Две интере́сные студе́нтки в суббо́ту приходи́ли на встре́чу (2 nom.fem = nom.pl.adj, gen.sg.noun)

Counting.english: Two wooden chairs are in the room
Counting.russian: В ко́мнате два деревя́нных сту́ла (2 nom.masc = gen.pl.adj, gen.sg.noun)

Counting.english: I have four English books
Counting.russian: У меня́ четыре англи́йских рома́на (gen.pl.adj, gen.sg.noun)

Counting.english: We have five nice cars
Counting.russian: У на́с пя́ть кра́сных маши́н (gen.pl)

Counting.english: We bought twelve new computers
Counting.russian: Мы́ купи́ли де́сять но́вых компью́теров (gen.pl)

Counting.english: The driver met six foreign students at the airport
Counting.russian: Води́тель встре́тил шесть иностра́нных студе́нтов в аэропорту́ (gen.pl)

Counting.english: I took two clean glasses
Counting.russian: Я взя́л два чи́стых стака́на

Counting.english: I have received three long-awaited letters
Counting.russian: Я получи́л три долгожда́нных письма́

Counting.english: We saw three yellow birds in the garden
Counting.russian: Мы ви́дели трёх жёлтых птиц в саду́ (anim.acc = gen numeral, gen.pl.adj, gen.pl.noun)

Counting.english: Nina has sold four good kittens on the market
Counting.russian: Ни́на продала́ четырёх хоро́шеньких котя́т на ры́нке
